fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.processors
Class EmotionMLExporter

java.lang.Object
  fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.processors.EmotionMLProcessor
      fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.processors.EmotionMLExporter
Direct Known Subclasses:
JaxbEmotionMLExporter, JsonEmotionMLExporter
public class EmotionMLExporter
extends EmotionMLProcessor

A EmotionMLExporter is an EmotionMLProcessor that exports EmotionML objects in an OutputStream by first building DOM elements corresponding to them then validating them.

Author:
Alexandre Denis

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new EmotionMLExporter based on a default EmotionMLValidator.
